Package com.chess.piece

Class King

java.lang.Object
com.chess.piece.Piece
com.chess.piece.King
public class King
extends Piece
King class is a child class of the Piece class It deals with the construction and the movement of the King piece on the board and other specific methods needed for the King piece The methods found here are: calculateLegalMove(), movePiece(), isColA(), isColH(), isCastled(), and toString()

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class com.chess.piece.Piece

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Collection<Move> calculateLegalMove​(Board board)
    calculateLegalMove() is an override method from the parent class because the bishop has its own special movements there is a for loop that passes through the constants int array called POSSIBLE_MOVE_TILE and checks if the possibleMove can be done
    boolean isCastled()
    isCaslted() is a boolean method that allows the caller to get the boolean value stored inside the isCaslted variable
    King movePiece​(Move move)
    movePiece() creates a new King for the new state of the board
    java.lang.String toString()
    This is for the moveLog to show for the GameHistoryPanel for the GUI

  • Method Details

    • calculateLegalMove

      public java.util.Collection<Move> calculateLegalMove​(Board board)
      calculateLegalMove() is an override method from the parent class because the bishop has its own special movements there is a for loop that passes through the constants int array called POSSIBLE_MOVE_TILE and checks if the possibleMove can be done
      Specified by:
      calculateLegalMove in class Piece
      Parameters:
      board - is the current state of the board in which it can calculate its legal moves
      Returns:
      an immutable list of legalMoves

    • movePiece

      public King movePiece​(Move move)
      movePiece() creates a new King for the new state of the board
      Specified by:
      movePiece in class Piece
      Parameters:
      move - which is the move object
      Returns:
      a new King

    • isCastled

      public boolean isCastled()
      isCaslted() is a boolean method that allows the caller to get the boolean value stored inside the isCaslted variable
      Returns:
      a boolean value stored in isCastled variable

    • toString

      public java.lang.String toString()
      This is for the moveLog to show for the GameHistoryPanel for the GUI
      Overrides:
      toString in class java.lang.Object
      Returns:
      the toString() of the PieceType which is the king in this case
